problem_text_cn: 如图,PQ、PR、AB是⊙O的切线,切点分别为Q、R、S,若∠APB=40°,则∠A0B等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, PQ, PR, AB are the tangent of ⊙O, and the tangent points are Q, R, and S respectively. If ∠APB = N_0, then ∠AOB is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:∵PQ、PR是⊙O的切线,∴∠PRO=∠PQO=90°,∵∠APB=40°,∴∠ROQ=360°-2×90°-40°=140°,∵PR、AB是⊙O的切线,∴∠AOS=\frac{1}{2}∠ROS,同理:∠BOS=\frac{1}{2}QOS=\frac{1}{2}SOQ,∴∠AOB=∠AOS+∠BOS=\frac{1}{2}∠ROQ=70°,故选:D．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质,运用切线的性质来进行计算或论证,常通过作辅助线连接圆心和切点,利用垂直构造直角三角形解决有关问题,是基础题型．
